titleStmt.title: Die Jovis. 12 Maii. 1642. The declarations of both Houses of Parliament.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: May. 16. London, Printed for Joseph Hunscott,

notesStmt.note: The Lords and Commons will maintain the committees at York in what they have done and shall do. Any person arresting them or any of them, .. or injuring them is declared a public enemy. .. -- Steele.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
